representation_information.name: OEBF, Open eBook Forum Publication Structure 1.0.1
representation_information.description: An XML-based specification for the content, structure, and presentation of electronic books, a predecessor to the EPUB format. OEBPS was developed by the Open eBook Forum, a group of organizations involved in electronic publishing and now known as the International Digital Publishing Forum (IDPF).

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
